regen.absent_element: lack of permanent mute option for audible alarms
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an option to permanently mute the audible alarm for specific devices.
There shall be an option to turn off the audible alarm permanently until manually reactivated.
The GUI shall allow the ability to mute the audible alarm permanently when needed.

label: There shall be an option to turn off the audible alarm permanently.
absence: action of turning off the audible alarm permanently
